welcome_message_body: Welcome to Legnano, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Buon viaggio!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used primarily for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
